text: usane tumhen akelee jaan paida kiya; phir usee se usaka joda banaaya aur tumhaare lie chaupaayon mein se aath nar-maada utaare. vah tumhaaree maanon ke peton mein teen andheron ke bheetar tumhen ek srjanaroop ke pashchaat any ek srjanaroop deta chala jaata hai. vahee allaah tumhaara rab hai. baadashaahee usee kee hai, usake atirikt koee poojy-prabhu nahin. phir tum kahaan phire jaate ho
